overview: VCFtools is a versatile set of tools for working with Variant Call Format (VCF) files commonly used in genetics and genomics research. It allows researchers to perform various operations on genetic variation data, such as filtering, summarizing, and analyzing genetic variants in VCF format.
core_features: Filtering and subsetting VCF files based on criteria
Calculating allele frequency and basic population genetics statistics
Quality control and data manipulation for genetic variant analysis
Integration with other bioinformatics tools and workflows
